content: welcome to the 2023 fiber flux fall crochet along… for this one we ll be making the crochet pumpkin tower the cal will be divided into multiple parts and we ll be tackling each part each week of the cal see dates below and visit our cal group using the link below to get to each week s link wednesday october 4 introduction & supplies wednesday october 11 the pumpkins wednesday october 18 the stem & leaves wednesday october 25 assembly & finishing wednesday november 1 cal recap join our ravelry group the fiber flux crochet crochet along community to connect with other cal makers join cal group here 1 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/fiber-flux-cal-community s=tab
